doc:
Scott James Wells https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scott_James_Wells 0 Scott James Wells (July 4, 1961 – October 28, 2015) was an American actor and model, primarily noted for playing the villain Lex Luthor during the first season of the television series Superboy. After his departure from the series in 1989, Scott Wells appeared in The Taking of Beverly Hills. Subsequently, to this film he retired from show business. Besides acting on TV he could be seen in print ads for Calvin Klein and billboards for Coppertone. In 1988, he appeared in the music video "Anything For You" by Gloria Estefan. Scott_James_Wells ( July_4_,_1961 – October_28_,_2015 ) was an_American_actor_and_model , primarily_noted for playing the_villain_Lex_Luthor during the_first_season of the_television_series_Superboy . After his_departure from the_series in 1989 , Scott_Wells appeared in The_Taking of Beverly_Hills . Subsequently , to this_film he retired from show_business . Besides acting on TV he could_be_seen in print_ads for Calvin_Klein and billboards for Coppertone . In 1988 , he appeared in the_music_video_"_Anything For You " by Gloria_Estefan .
